result.reason: The feature can be implemented by extending the existing VNC SpecialKeys mechanism to support the Windows key (XK_Super_L) using reflection to access the underlying VncClient key sending method, similar to the existing lock key filter.
result.approach: Add 'WindowsKey' to SpecialKeys enums. Update ProtocolVNC.SendSpecialKeys to handle the new key by using reflection to call WriteKeyboardEvent on the VncClient instance with the XK_Super_L keysym. Add a new menu item to the ConnectionWindow UI and bind it to the new functionality.
